item.title: Sharpening Skills: My Project Experience with the U.S. Cyber Challenge
item.description:
üõ°Ô∏è Cybersecurity is more than a career path ‚Äî it‚Äôs a calling. I‚Äôm proud to share that I recently participated in the U.S. Cyber Challenge (USCC), where I completed a project that tested my technical expertise, creativity, and resilience under pressure.

The competition brought together aspiring cybersecurity professionals from across the country. My project focused on system defense and vulnerability analysis, requiring me to apply skills in cloud infrastructure, scripting, and network security. The judges and mentors highlighted my persistence, methodical approach, and ability to document solutions clearly ‚Äî qualities I‚Äôve worked hard to cultivate in both my homelab and academic journey.
